title: Game locking up and freezing in game
body:
Had an issue in one game earlier where the game completely froze up for like 10-20 seconds 3 different times. It wasn't a classic lag out, the rest of my computer was running fine (had my playlist running in the background just fine), and I was able to alt tab between the frozen game and other things without it going unresponsive by windows standards. 

I left the game, closed the client, reopened and everything was fine.

Any way i could pass some logs to a dev or something to take a look at?

replies.body: I've been having the same problem

This seems like packet loss or your network to the game server getting stuck.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these impacted games so we can get a better overview on what's happening.  Let me know!
There's only 1 game that's been affected, is there a way to zero in on that one so I don't upload a bunch of unnecessary stuff for the tech guys to sift through?

You should be able to specifically use the log reader on the match you experienced this.  There's a good chance that it's going to continue to degrade in the future, so better to knock this issue out asap!
